Text.Value: I know that symbol on its collar - you don't belong to Gale, do you?
That symbol on the collar looks familiar. Does this - thing - belong to Gale?
The symbol on the collar... does that mean this is Gale's pet?
I know that symbol on the collar. This wing-cat-thing must be Gale's.
That collar looks familiar. Something to do with Gale?
That marking - this creature is something to Gale.
That symbol upon the collar... an acquaintance of yours, Gale?
That feline resembles our wizard. Not just the unkempt whiskers, but the symbol on the collar.
That symbol on its throat - this mewling abomination is Gale's?
That collar looks familiar... does this cat belong to Gale?

EditorData.logicalname: Player sees Tara without Gale nearby

Text.Value: A winged cat? Sure, why not? It's not even in the top five weirdest things we've seen.
Oh! They make them with wings?
A cat, with wings...? That's new. At least to me, anyway.
A cat with wings. As if they weren't trouble enough.
Winged cat. Well, stranger things have happened.
A cat - with wings. As if that species needed another means to slink around.
A cat, with wings...?
What is that creature? I thought it was a displacer kitten for a moment.
A bewinged cat...? Hairballs raining from the sky - a frightening prospect, Boo.
A cat... with wings?

EditorData.logicalname: Player sees Tara, but doesn't recongize the symbol

Text.Value: Is that Gale's winged moggy? What's it doing here?
Look there - Gale's tressym. Why is it here?
Isn't that Gale's tressym? What's she doing here?
Gale's tressym flew the coop. Wonder what she's up to.
Hey, isn't that Gale's tressym friend?
Tara. Gale's tressym grew restless at camp.
Is that not Gale's tressym companion, Tara? What brings her here?
The wizard's pet. Looks like she's on the prowl.
Gale's feathered friend has slipped her leash. Eyes away from Boo, cloud-cat!
Say - is that Gale's tressym? I wonder what it's doing out here.
It is. It's Tara! What's she doing all the way out here?
I've never seen a tressym before, let alone a stray. What are you doing here?
A tressym, is it? Too similar to a 'cat' for my liking.
A tressym - wings and all. Never saw one in real life.
Oh, nice - a tressym. Better mousers than garden-variety cats, or so I've heard.
A tressym! Never seen a real one before.
A tressym! I've never seen one so close.
A tressym. I am blessed to see one outside of books.
Look there - a tressym. The wings are deliciously tender when roasted.
A tressym. Cat and hawk in one, with twice the appetite for hamster.
A tressym. Never seen one in the flesh before.

EditorData.logicalname: Player sees Tara, doesn't know Gale

Text.Value: Gale - that's your symbol on its collar. This isn't yours, is it?
A familiar symbol on the collar. Gale, does this - thing - belong to you?
That symbol... Gale, is this tressym yours?
I'd know that symbol on the collar anywhere. Does this flying cat belong to you?
Hey, I know that symbol. Gale, do you know this tressym?
That marking - Gale, this tressym is  something to you?
That symbol... Gale, is that tressym an acquaintance of yours?
That feline reminds me of you, wizard. Not just because of the unkempt whiskers, but that symbol on the collar.
That symbol on its throat - is this mewling abomination yours, Gale?
That symbol on the collar... Gale, is this one yours?

EditorData.logicalname: Player sees Tara with Gale nearby

Synopsis:
Not Gale approaches Tara
Note: when Gale is avatar and camp night NIGHT_Gale_TressymJoin has happened, the players will have seen a tressym before.
